synopsis.text:
Linker Haruyuki Arita, a victim of relentless bullying, finds solace in a virtual world set in 2046. His life takes a dramatic turn when the revered Kuroyukihime introduces him to 'Accel World' and the 'Brain Burst' program. This unique application allows users to accelerate their cognitive abilities to unimaginable speeds, making time appear to stand still.

Haruyuki, now a knight for Kuroyukihime, quickly rises to prominence in the world of Burst Linkers. Their shared goal is to reach the highest level in the game, but their journey is fraught with challenges. A mysterious black cloud begins to spread, preventing Burst Linkers from accelerating and causing widespread malfunctions in Tokyo's security cameras.

The cloud's emergence is not an isolated incident; it's a glitch in the Brain Burst program that threatens the very bond that connects the Burst Linkers. To protect their connection and restore their acceleration abilities, Haruyuki, Kuroyukihime, and their legion, Nega Nebulus, must unite with other legions. Their mission: confront an ancient, powerful being sealed away since the dawn of the Accelerated World. Will they succeed in restoring order and preserving their unique bond? Join Haruyuki and his friends as they embark on this thrilling adventure in the Accel World.
